content: uCapture Android audio recorder - Tasks 1-6 complete. App records audio with GPS/calendar metadata, uploads to Google Drive.
Restored chunk duration to 30min default/5min minimum for production (was 1min for testing)

Android foreground services must be started with startForegroundService() not just bindService(). BIND_AUTO_CREATE causes service destruction when last client unbinds, killing recordings on navigation.
Recording controls now send intents to service instead of calling methods on bound service. This ensures commands survive navigation/unbind.
Pause now immediately finalizes current chunk (stops audio, persists to DB, queues upload). Resume starts fresh chunk in same session. Ensures no audio loss on pause.
Stop recording creates final chunk if actively recording. If already paused, chunk was saved on pause so stop just cleans up.
Record button now resumes when paused (in addition to starting new recording). Pause only via dedicated pause button.
Clean up debug logging in GoogleDriveAuthManager
Fix test failures in SettingsViewModelTest (stale tests referencing removed methods)
Handle token expiration - access tokens expire after 1 hour, currently requires re-sign-in
Restore chunk duration to 30min for production
